accommodationMeals.breakfast: For our breakfast: we have 1 chicken sandwich, 1 beef sandwich, french fries, 1 caesar salad, orange juice or apple juice and fruit of the day.
accommodationMeals.dinner: For our dinner: we have 1 chicken salad, 1 carrot soup, capocollo dish or bresaola dish, a bowl of home made chips with sauce, orange juice or apple juice and fruit of the day.
